result.title: Manuscript on the formation, evolution and death of a comet addressing the open questions on formation
result.description: Manuscript on the formation, evolution and death of a comet addressing the open questions on formation. This will address the open questions on formation with respect to, composition of 67P, the D/H ratio of comets and the surface alteration and internal structure of 67P

result.title: A preliminary global DTM reconstructed by a method combining the stereo and clinometry information
